channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- WebThings Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- WebThings Gateway

item.title: CVE-2020-6804|2024-08-04T09:11:05.124Z -- mozilla -- webthings%20gateway
item.description: A reflected XSS vulnerability exists within the gateway, allowing an attacker to craft a specialized URL which could steal the user's authentication token. When combined with CVE-2020-6803, an attacker could fully compromise the system.

item.title: CVE-2020-6803|2024-08-04T09:11:05.086Z -- mozilla -- webthings%20gateway
item.description: An open redirect is present on the gateway's login page, which could cause a user to be redirected to a malicious site after logging in.
